snippet: Ms. Cooper, who is credited with turning around the dilapidated Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, stepped down last year amid charges that she stole over $50,000 from a nonprofit group.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Cooper, who is credited with turning around the dilapidated Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, stepped down last year amid charges that she stole over $50,000 from a nonprofit group.

headline.seo: Estelle Cooper, Former Park Administrator Accused of Theft, Dies at 82
headline.main: Estelle Cooper, Queens Park Chief Accused of Theft, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Estelle Cooper, Queens Park Chief Accused of Theft, Dies at 82
